layout.name: intro
layout.notes: Starts with drum beat. Everyone joins on second part

layout.name: verse1a
layout.notes: Halfway through draw out the chords
layout.lyrics: Her love ain't like a typical emotion...

layout.name: verse1b
layout.lyrics: Here we are in an orderly fashion...

layout.name: chorus
layout.lyrics: Lovely lady when I knew felt ya...

layout.notes: Halfway through draw out the chords
layout.lyrics: Her love ain't like a typical emotion...

layout.name: verse2b
layout.lyrics: Here we are in an orderly fashion...

layout.name: chorus

layout.lyrics: Lovely lady when I knew felt ya...

layout.lyrics: Lovely lady when I knew felt ya...
